statements: SELECT * FROM irrigation_pattern;
SELECT id, location, moisture_level FROM irrigation_pattern WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM irrigation_pattern WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT id, location, water_usage FROM irrigation_pattern WHERE water_usage < 100;
SELECT sensor_id, location, irrigation_time FROM irrigation_pattern WHERE location = 'Garden';
SELECT location, moisture_level, water_usage FROM irrigation_pattern WHERE location = 'Garden' ORDER BY moisture_level DESC
SELECT * FROM irrigation_pattern WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND moisture_level < 0.5
SELECT location, water_usage FROM irrigation_pattern WHERE moisture_level BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM irrigation_pattern GROUP BY sensor_id, location HAVING count(*) > 3
SELECT id, location, irrigation_time FROM irrigation_pattern ORDER BY irrigation_time ASC
SELECT * FROM irrigation_data WHERE farm_id = 1;
SELECT field_id, field_name, crop_type FROM field_info WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT temperature, water_usage FROM irrigation_data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(water_usage) AS max_water_usage, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM irrigation_data;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_data WHERE farm_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, location FROM field_info WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(water_usage) AS max_water FROM irrigation_data GROUP BY farm_id;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT field_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM field_info JOIN irrigation_data ON field_info.field_id = irrigation_data.farm_id GROUP BY field_id HAVING avg_temp > 25;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationDetails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, water_source FROM IrrigationDetails WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT field_id, crop_type, planting_date FROM FieldData WHERE soil_moisture < 20;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_value BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationDetails WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM IrrigationDetails WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location, water_source FROM IrrigationDetails WHERE location = 'Field_A' AND water_source = 'River';
SELECT field_id, crop_type, planting_date, soil_moisture, irrigation_schedule FROM FieldData ORDER BY planting_date;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'moisture_sensor' AND sensor_value < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM SensorData WHERE field_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_zone;
SELECT zone_name, crop_type FROM irrigation_zone WHERE area_sqm > 100;
SELECT zone_name, area_sqm FROM irrigation_zone ORDER BY area_sqm DESC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT zone_name, moisture_level FROM irrigation_zone JOIN soil_moisture ON irrigation_zone.zone_id = soil_moisture.zone_id;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_zone ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT zone_name, crop_type FROM irrigation_zone WHERE crop_type='Corn';
SELECT zone_name, area_sqm FROM irrigation_zone WHERE area_sqm > 500;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT zone_name, reading_time, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture JOIN irrigation_zone ON soil_moisture.zone_id = irrigation_zone.zone_id WHERE moisture_level < 30;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_zones;
SELECT zone_name, irrigation_area FROM irrigation_zones WHERE soil_type = 'clay';
SELECT zone_id, zone_name, soil_type FROM irrigation_zones ORDER BY zone_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE amount_used > 100;
SELECT zone_id, date, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture WHERE moisture_level < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_zones ORDER BY zone_name DESC, irrigation_area ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT zone_id, zone_name, irrigation_area FROM irrigation_zones WHERE soil_type='Clay' OR soil_type='Loam';
SELECT zone_name, start_time, end_time FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE day_of_week='Monday' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT zone_name, moisture_level FROM irrigation_zones INNER JOIN soil_moisture ON irrigation_zones.zone_id = soil_moisture.zone_id WHERE date='2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE amount_used > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
